greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = n*A054525(n,k) read by rows.
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
maple: A125093 := proc(n,k) if n = k then n; elif n mod k = 0 then n*numtheory[mobius](n/k) ; else 0; end if; end proc:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 22 2007
ext: Offset and definition corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 10 2011
